resources.string: This app knows how to wake you up. Get up and stay fit - with the Fitari Fitness Alarm Clock!

Did you know that you can read the text of a website directly into this app?

I did copy-paste an example link that you might find interesting.
Press the button below to load its text!
Enjoy reading texts with SpeedRead? \nYou could help us by rating the app on Google Play! \nDo you want to rate it now?
Type/Copy text you want to read here
You can also copy an URL into this field to read its text
Press here to speed read the text
You\'ll notice how much faster you\'re capable to read text now!
if it was useful for you and you\'d like to support it
to free up the text field
Now you know everything about this app

Do you want to read more stuff while still being able to grasp what you're reading?
Guess what, your mind is amazing & you can read much faster than you thought. The typical reader can read about 200 words per minute with an understanding of about 60 per cent if you read from left to right. 
But if you read it one word at a time without having to move your head, you will raise your words per minute without losing your comprehension!
Not buying it?
Go ahead and press the button below or Paste your own text, OR type in an URL. Enjoy :)
\"Do you agree to the Terms of Service (TOS) and the Privacy Policy? \nYou can find them here: \"

It's possible! Read Text quicker than ever before - with the SpeedRead app. 

https://bit.ly/speedreadapp
#SpeedRead #AndroidApp
You can stop the text flow. To do this, simply tap on the screen while you\'re speedreading!
You can bookmark a long text and read it later. While reading, do a long back press & choose \"bookmark\". \n\nThe text you didn\'t read yet will automatically be loaded when you restart the app.
